nodes.text: The DC-17m Interchangeable Weapon System, also known as the DC-17m Repeating Blaster Rifle, was a type of blaster rifle used by Republic clone commandos during the Clone Wars. The weapon was also used by pirates from Hondo Ohnaka's gang.

The DC-17m Interchangeable Weapon System appeared canonically in "Missing in Action," a 2013 episode for the TV series Star Wars: The Clone Wars. The blaster was identified in the 2018 reference book Star Wars: The Complete Visual Dictionary, New Edition. The blaster first appeared in the Star Wars Legends 2005 video game Star Wars: Republic Commando.
